sys_remote_update_set.description: A Flow Designer action that allows sending chat messages to a specified user.
sys_remote_update_set.name: Flow Designer - Connect Chat Action

Create the Conversation var conversation = sn_connect.Conversation.create({ name: inputs.subject, type: "connect" }); // 2. Add the provided user to the conversation as a subscriber conversation.addSubscriber(inputs.user.getValue('sys_id')); // 3. Send the message conversation.sendMessage({ body: inputs.body }); // 4. Get the new conversation's Sys ID outputs.conversation = getConversation(inputs.subject); } catch (err) { outputs.error_message = err; } } else { // Conversation Sys ID passed, add message to existing conversation try { // 1. Get the conversation by provided Sys ID var conversation = sn_connect.Conversation.get(inputs.conversation); // 2. Send the message conversation.sendMessage({ body: inputs.body }); } catch (err) { outputs.error_message = err; } } // Since the Conversation API does not provide a GlideRecord object or Sys ID, // look up the most recently created conversation by subject and return the Sys ID function getConversation(subject) { var conversationId; var grConvo = new GlideRecord('live_group_profile'); grConvo.addQuery('name', 'CONTAINS', subject); grConvo.orderByDesc('sys_created_on'); grConvo.query(); if (grConvo.next()) { conversationId = grConvo.getValue('sys_id'); } return conversationId; } })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719bsys_hub_step_instancea1e37e7f1b3e34d0c297c803604bcb75400sys_variable_valuekcuster2021-10-01 21:08:23da0432bf1b3e34d0c297c803604bcb030kcuster2021-10-01 21:08:23f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4applicationa1e37e7f1b3e34d0c297c803604bcb75kcuster2021-10-01 21:08:239e0432bf1b3e34d0c297c803604bcb020kcuster2021-10-01 21:08:23var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7

Get the conversation by provided Sys ID var conversation = sn_connect.Conversation.get(inputs.conversation); // 2. Send the message conversation.sendMessage({ body: inputs.body }); } catch (err) { outputs.error_message = err; } } // Since the Conversation API does not provide a GlideRecord object or Sys ID, // look up the most recently created conversation by subject and return the Sys ID function getConversation(subject) { var conversationId; var grConvo = new GlideRecord('live_group_profile'); grConvo.addQuery('name', 'CONTAINS', subject); grConvo.orderByDesc('sys_created_on'); grConvo.query(); if (grConvo.next()) { conversationId = grConvo.getValue('sys_id'); } return conversationId; } })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719bsys_hub_step_instance6977f6731b7e34d0c297c803604bcbda350sys_variable_valuekcuster2021-10-01 21:23:22bd773a731b7e34d0c297c803604bcb070kcuster2021-10-01 21:23:22cbd1070373531010791f94596bf6a776sys_hub_step_instance6977f6731b7e34d0c297c803604bcbda200sys_variable_valuekcuster2021-10-01 21:23:22f5773a731b7e34d0c297c803604bcb080kcuster2021-10-01 21:23:222c226939b3101300176b051a16a8dc83application6977f6731b7e34d0c297c803604bcbdakcuster2021-10-01 21:23:22f1773a731b7e34d0c297c803604bcb070kcuster2021-10-01 21:23:22var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7
